general.gigTitle: develop the website with next js, react js, and tailwind from any design

sellerCard.description: I am a professional web developer with more than four years of experience in the web development sector. I specialize in Converting Figma/any sketch to React(Next JS). My core skills are HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, React JS, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, Vanilla JavaScript, Scss, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. I always give my clients a chance to prove my best and offer 60 Days of Free Support.

description.content:
Convert Figma to Responsive React js/Next js Websites


Greetings!


Looking to transform your Figma designs into dynamic, responsive React JS or Next JS web? You are at the right spot!


In today's digital age, a bespoke web presence isn't just desired it's imperative Unlike generic templates a custom web app can encapsulate your unique brand vision and values


Why Choose Me?


  • Expertise: With vast experience as a React js developer I specialize in pixel-perfect websites from Figma designs


  • Strategic Approach: I'm not just another developer for hire. Every project undertaken is to turn your vision into a digital reality


  • Quality Assurance: My commitment is beyond code. I ensure the product is fast, SEO-optimized code


Offerings:


  • convert figma to react or figma to next.js
  • fast loading speeds with responsive web design
  • cross-browser compatibility check and SEO-optimized React websites
  • I will also do Custom React website and dynamic web development
  • Figma to react.js / figma to react
  • Figma to HTML / PSD to HTML
  • professional website designer
  • Responsive web design

packageList.title: Landing Page
packageList.description: Single page Using tailwind CSS OR Bootstrap, I will create the landing page in the Next JS.

packageList.title: Website with 3 Pages
packageList.description: Three of the pages will include animations using AOS. Code that is clean and SEO and Data Handle.

packageList.title: With 5 pages or More
packageList.description: Build complex design with complete data handle, API calling, Redux Store, SSR, and what you need

reviews.comment: Really outstanding work easy to work with and flexible in implementation of design. Good skill, cut in full stack with a fast ability to respond and implement requests. Very strong recommendation!

seller_response.comment:
Very helpful, friendly and flexible. 
Amazing experience

reviews.comment: Minhazul is a very good listener. Communication was very easy with him and he did everything what I have asked. Thank you. Highly recommend! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Amazing Experience. I'm very excited to work with her again.

reviews.comment: Outstanding work. Good knowledge of fire store, database, structuring, and integration and good skill at GPTAPI calls.

seller_response.comment: Clear, respectful, and cooperative throughout the process. His kindness and generosity were truly appreciated, making this collaboration a pleasure.
